Title: Relates to wage reporting in the unemployment insurance law
Summary: Provides that to achieve cost savings to businesses and the state, improve decision timeliness, and minimize wrong-sized payments to eligible beneficiaries the department of labor shall obtain current employment and income information from a third-party provider, supplementing current state wage reporting files from the department of taxation and finance.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to wage reporting in the unemployment insurance law
